data.enText: to make sure that sth happens or is definite

data.chText: 这本书保证了他的成功。
请务必将所有灯都关掉。
data.enText: Please ensure (that) all lights are switched off.

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+名词短语

tr: be careful or certain to do something
example: He verified that the valves were closed
See that the curtains are closed
control the quality of the product
This nest egg will ensure a nice retirement for us

value.def: To ensure something, or to ensure that something happens, means to make certain that it happens.

example.ex: Britain's negotiators had ensured that the treaty which resulted was a significant change in direction...
example.tran: 英国谈判代表已经担保由此而签订的条约将是方向上的重大改变。

example.ex: Ensure that it is written into your contract.
example.tran: 确保把这一点写入合同中。

example.ex: ...the President's Council, which ensures the supremacy of the National Party.
example.tran: 保证国民党最高地位的总统咨询委员会
